mapper.select: SELECT count(*) cnt FROM customer_tb WHERE cust_id = #{strid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_tb (CUST_ID, CUST_PWD, CUST_NM, CUST_EM, CUST_PH, CUST_GEN, JUMIN1, JUMIN2, CUST_AGE, ZIPCODE, ENABLE_NO, AUTHOR, CUST_DT, SUBADDRESS) VALUES (#{CUST_ID}, #{CUST_PWD}, #{CUST_NM}, #{CUST_EM}, #{CUST_PH}, #{CUST_GEN}, #{JUMIN1}, #{JUMIN2}, #{CUST_AGE}, #{ZIPCODE}, 1, default, sysdate, #{SUBADDRESS})
mapper.select: SELECT CUST_PWD FROM customer_tb WHERE cust_id = #{id}
SELECT AUTHOR FROM customer_tb WHERE cust_id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zipcodes_tb WHERE ZIP_CD = #{ZIPCODE}
select c.*, z.ADDRESS1, z.ADDRESS2 from customer_tb c, zipcodes_tb z where c.zipcode = z.zip_cd and cust_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update CUSTOMER_TB set CUST_PWD=#{CUST_PWD}, CUST_EM=#{CUST_EM}, CUST_PH=#{CUST_PH}, SUBADDRESS=#{SUBADDRESS}, ZIPCODE = #{ZIPCODE} where CUST_ID=#{CUST_ID}
update ZIPCODES_TB set ADDRESS1=#{ADDRESS1}, ADDRESS2=#{ADDRESS2} where ZIP_CD=#{ZIPCODE}
mapper.select: select * from (select PET_CD, CUST_ID, PK_CD, PET_AGE, PET_NM, PET_CON, PET_IMG, PET_DT, rowNum rNum from (select * from PET_TB order by abs(PET_CD) desc) ) where rNum >= #{start} and rNum <= #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PET_TB (PET_CD, CUST_ID, PK_CD, PET_AGE, PET_NM, PET_CON, PET_IMG, PET_DT) VALUES (PET_TB_seq.nextval, #{CUST_ID}, #{PK_CD}, #{PET_AGE}, #{PET_NM}, #{PET_CON}, #{PET_IMG}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from PET_TB

select ck.CK_KIND type, cl.CL_CD _id, cl.CL_TITLE title, cl.CL_MEMO description, to_char (cl.START_TM, 'YY-MM-DDTHH24:MI') start, to_char (cl.END_TM, 'YY-MM-DDTHH24:MI') end from CALENDAR_TB cl, CALENDAR_KIND ck where CUST_ID = #{id} order by START_TM asc
